name: Farming of Isaac
description:
Introduction - 

This is a Binding of Isaac style Roguelike made with NES restrictions.

I made this game in a week for the Retro Game Jam, to learn about these types of games. Unfortunately I couldn't add more features in that time. Hope you enjoy it anyway.

Controls -

Use W, A, S and D to move. 

Use Arrow Keys to Shoot.

Instructions -

Destroy all the enemies to unlock the room.

Unlock all rooms to finish the game.

There are four rooms, each room has three different random combinations. So there are 81 unique playthroughs. A lot of the rooms are similar to each other though. I didn't have time to make each room more different.
